src:
서장은 한국전시산업진흥회장
07 Nov 2019, 18:45 by 조선일보
입력 2019.11.08 03:45



서장은 ㈜엑스코 대표이사 사장이 최근 열린 한국전시산업진흥회 임시총회에서 제13대 회장으로 선임됐다. 임기는 내년 8월까지다. 서울시 정무조정실장, 주히로시마 총영사를 지냈다.
좋아요 0 Copyright ⓒ 조선일보 & Chosun.com 제휴안내구독신청
text:
Chief of the Korea Exhibition Industry Promotion Association
07 Nov 2019, 18:45 by Chosun Daily
Enter 2019.11.08 03:45



The president was appointed as the 13th chairman at the temporary exhibition of the Korea Exhibition Industry Promotion Association held by CEO of Exco. His term is until August next year. He was the head of Seoul's Political Coordinator, Consul General, Hiroshima.
